thread.title: Hermanus Boonzaaier

author: Hermanus Boonzaaier
title: Hermanus Boonzaaier
text: Booked online and had a phone call within 10 minutes confirming a time slot very efficient. The cost of the tyre was very good. The young man arrived within the time slot and was very friendly. Only bad feedback would be the option to have the tyre fitted on the same day would be even better would certainly recommend to friends and family and will use again
